createCommands: flutter create myflutterapp && cd myflutterapp && flutter run
folderStructure:
myflutterapp/
├── lib/
│   ├── main.dart
│   └── screens/
├── android/
├── ios/
├── web/
└── pubspec.yaml
quickstart:
1. Run the create command
2. Connect device or start emulator
3. Run: flutter run
4. Start developing
